videoSnippet.title: Now That is One Crazy Najdorf || Caruana vs MVL || Sinquefield Cup (2019)
videoSnippet.description:

Download agadmator chess clock for Android here https://play.google.com/store/Qapps/details?id=com.agadmator.chessclock&fbclid=IwAR3b_sRch6nsuW59-bWoirVDMMJ8V5jexZdUB0bsxQrc0Q8imvkBtqkHUXQ&rdid=com.agadmator.chessclock

Fabiano Caruana vs Maxime Vachier-Lagrave
Sinquefield Cup (2019), St Louis, MO USA, rd 6, Aug-23 
Sicilian Defense: Najdorf Variation. Adams Attack (B90)

1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 d6 3. d4 cd4 4. Nd4 Nf6 5. Nc3 a6 6. h3 e5 7. Nb3 Be6 8. f4 g6 9. Be2 Nbd7 10. g4 Rc8 11. f5 Bb3 12. ab3 Rc3 13. bc3 Ne4 14. O-O Qh4 15. Bf3 gf5 16. Be4 fe4 17. Kh2 Rg8 18. Ra4 Nf6 19. g5 Rg5 20. Bg5 Qg5 21. c4 Qh4 22. Qe1 Qe1 23. Re1 Bh6 24. Rd1 Kd7 25. c5 d5 26. Rb4 Kc7 27. Rb6 Bf4 28. Kg2 Nd7 29. Rd5 Nb6 30. cb6 Kb6 31. Rd7 a5 32. Rf7 h6 33. Kf2 Kc6 34. Ke2 b5 35. Rf6 Kc5 36. c3 a4 37. ba4 ba4 38. Ra6 Kb5 39. Ra7 Bg5 40. Ra8 Be7 41. Kd2 a3 42. Ke3 Kc4 43. Ke4 Kc3 44. Ke5 Kb3 45. Ke4 a2 46. Ra2 Ka2 47. Kf3 Kb3 48. h4 Kc4 49. h5 Kd3 50. Kg2 Ke2 51. Kh1 Kf2 52. Kh2 Bd6 53. Kh1 Be5

The Sinquefield Cup sees Magnus Carlsen and 11 more of the world's best players compete in the Saint Louis Chess Club from 17-28 August 2019. The event is the fifth leg of the 2019 Grand Chess Tour. In addition to tour points the prize fund is $325,000, with $90,000 for 1st place.

Players receive 130 minutes for the entire game, with a 30-second delay from move 1. A tie for first place will be decided in a 2-game rapid mini-match (10 min + 5 sec delay), in case of just two tied players, and if necessary an Armageddon game (5 vs. 4) on 29 August at 13:00 local time. Official website: Grand Chess Tour

To those of you who read the description: You are an excellent subscriber! :)
